content: crochet a meaningful **remembrance angel** to honor loved ones or gift as a handmade keepsake this pattern is crocheted in one piece from the head to the skirt using **red heart super saver yarn medium \ 4\ ** and a **4 mm g crochet hook** you ll need about **35 g 64 yds ** of yarn so one skein makes approximately **5 angels** simple stitches **single_crochet half_double_crochet fphdc fpsc decrease treble_crochet and dtr** create beautiful texture and shape the angel stands on her own and can be personalized with glitter bells or ribbons skill level easy yarn red heart super saver medium \ 4\ hook 4 mm g finished size approx 4 5 in 11 5 cm tall free pattern available on my website premium ad-free pdf also available here for easy printing **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
